title: Introduction speech
segmentation: Thank you, Mr President.
It has been very inspiring words.

I still remember that the youth from 2010 remember and repeated a few things that you said at the Summit 2010 and thank you for reminding clients about the index that was just recently launched by the OECD because we have a big privilege and honor to welcome here.
The former general Secretary of Oil City, Mr Donald Johnston.
Thank you, darling.
Now allow me please a few words about the challenge, future and our achievements.
This event is the final the 50 event of the whole Challenge Future Summit.
We're here gathering for the six days.
It was very emotional, very inspirational, and what I found out is that the youth is amazing tool to know more about the future and our hope for the future would actually be created now.
Which problem is channel shooter trying to solve and why?
Our focus is on the future.

I don't know if you're aware that at this moment 50% of the world population is below the age 26, but even more concerning is that in the next 10 years, 1.3 billion of the youth with entering the market of the employment.
However, there are only 300 million jobs.
With no calculate, we're in the time of the recession.

It is a huge crisis and there are only 200 million unemployment people around the world, so it never in the history of the human for civilization we have faced a big problem of the unemployment and especially of the youth.
Unemployment on the other side, the Ward still is facing many challenge.
Ages and many crisis.
And believe me, there are thousands of the competitions.
There are thousands of dangers.
There are excellent organizations worldwide, but the efforts to sustain to try to find a solution never happened.
Challenge Future is trying to merge this.
Do this two pulls the youth with challenges.

We're trying to give the opportunity and the voice to do youth to this 50% of the world population by doing two things, developing them that they get experience and self confidence and trying to find their way into life and also financial independency.
And on the other side to solve global challenges.
How have you been?
How have you been successful in the last year?
We done 9 challenges, 24,000 two.
Its worldwide join to this project.
We are in more than 213 countries and territories worldwide.
We are truly global but this is not the most important.
The most important is the impact that has been made out of that, not out of us but out of you.
200 two 110,000 volunteering covers an 270,000's life impacted and what is the most important?
This lies majority has been children and to use.
What we've done is that with the special Organizations Challenge shooter, we shift the management and leadership here from Slovenia to all corners around the world.
We fight for the truly inclusiveness on the challenge shooter for us.
It is not important if you have been into Harvard or in the Oxford becausw the intelligence and creativity is equally distributed worldwide, and all of you need to have a chance and opportunitie.
And finally, we are not satisfied with the ideas and innovations only.
We are only looking for the impact because only when the impact is made we are starting to act and we act.
We are changing the way how we leave and when we done this change we are actually creating the future that we all look for.
Now I will shortly pass.
Everything would be done in the last 14 months aside of the main competition for which the winners will be announced today.
And you can see there really coming worldwide.
We
Also makes several quick challenges, shorter competitions for the free months we try to solve the problem of the leg by call, the largest largest reserve of the sweet drinkable water on the Earth.
Unfortunately, that is polluted.
We face the challenge of the corruption and how to find fight against that.
We wanted to do the bid.
Is sustainable?
We search what do you see can do for the children with AIDS for the children in this lamps for the children that are disabled.
And we try to find what will happen in the next 15 years.
Which kind of disasters.
And very Interestingly, 85% of them are made by Demens, only 15 by the nature or by the unexpected invents.
And finally, because this project started in Slovenia, we are proud of our country.
We wanted it.
Also you would share and to know little bit more about that.
Therefore the last competition was about to make new stories, new touristic projects about the old legends in the story.
So, Slovenia, including about diplomat.
Aside that, we're proud that you started with the challenge you to chapters.
And that we have at this moment, 85 representatives of the challenge future in 31 country.
This and that.
Many among Q participated in the action teams, also driven by your inspiration and your cause.
But ladies and gentlemen's disorders defects.
If you would really, really know about the challenge shoot.
You would know that Africa is not a continent that is exporting just the poverty but also the continent of the talent.
You would know that even if you have been born in Croatia by the parents, Croat and Serb's you can become a great leader for the peace fighting against the mines worldwide.
You can, you will know that in India already exists Stainable leaders that are struggling with the daily other challenges.
But for two free years still be aligned with the challenge shooter and doing a great impact.
And you will know.
I think it's very difficult to see.
You will know that the people of Iran are very kind and they said they don't have nuclear weapon.
And you will know that here we have Israeli students who believe that it is very kind person who will try to do everything for the word peace.
And you would know that kind of start to feel Slovenia and also the other countries.
And you would know that there are 18 more such stories here in this room that I would like to share.
But there is no time.
But finally I can tell you that if we would really, really know about the challenge shooter, the talent shooter community will get the normal price in the year 2017.
